result_set.description: Topology change: Parent DID changed from 444444 to 444445

extended_fetch.description: Fetch entire resource if 1 (true), or resource link only if 0 (false)

hide_filterinfo.description: Suppress filterspec and current filter info if 1 (true)

link_disp_field.description: When not using extended_fetch, this determines which field is used for the "description" of the resource link

offset.description: Specifies the index of the first returned resource within the entire result set
